content: संकल्पः {@--1@} Will, volition, mental resolve; कः कामः संकल्पः Dk {@--2@} Purpose, aim, intention, determination. {@--3@} Wish, desire; संकल्पमात्रोदितसिद्धयस्ते <ls>R. 14. 17.</ls> {@--4@} Thought, idea, reflection, fancy, imagination; तत्संकल्पोपहितजाडिम स्तंभमभ्योति गात्रं <ls>Māl. 1. 35</ls>; वृथैव संकल्पशतैरजस्रमनंग नीतोसि मया विवृद्धिं <ls>Ś. 3. 5.</ls> {@--5@} The mind, heart; <ls>Māl. 6. 2.</ls> {@--6@} A solemn vow to perform an observance. {@--7@} Expectation of advantage from a holy voluntary act. {@--8@} Consideration, reflection. {@--9@} A declaration made by a widow at the time of burning herself with her husband.
